mapper.insert:
select "procomments_SEQ.nextVal from dual"
insert into procomments (proComNum, proNum, userId, proReg, proComment, code) values (#{proComNum},#{proNum},#{userId},sysdate,#{proComment},#{code})
mapper.select: select proNum, proComNum, proComment, userId, proReg from procomments where proNum = #{proNum} ORDER BY proComNum desc
